message: This is a low-quality product. I'm offering it to you for $10000. If you buy it, I'll tell you the outcome of the next product, and we can proceed with the next round. If you don't buy it, I'll keep the product and we'll move on to the next round without revealing any information about the next product.

I appreciate the offer, but I'm hesitant. While the peek option is intriguing, the odds are still against me. I'd rather pass for now and see what other opportunities arise.
